text: وانذر به الذين يخافون ان يحشروا۟ الى ربهم ليس لهم من دونه ولى ولا شفيع لعلهم يتقون

translations.translation: Warn by it those who fear they will be gathered to their Lord, having no protector or intercessor apart from Him, so that hopefully they will have taqwa.

Warn those who fear, through this (Qur'an), that they will be gathered before their Lord, and they will have none to protect or intercede for them apart from Him. They may haply take heed for themselves.

And warn with this (revealed message) those who fear that they shall be mustered to their Lord, that there will be none apart from Allah to act as their protector and intercessor; then maybe they will become God-fearing.

Preach the Quran to those who are concerned about the Day of Judgment at which time they will be brought before their Lord. Tell them that their only guardian and intercessor is God so that they may become pious.
And with this Qur’an warn those who fear, that they will be raised towards their Lord in a state when, except Allah, there will be no protector for them nor an intercessor, so that they may be pious.
And warn therewith those who fear that they will be gathered before their Lord, when there will be neither a protector nor an intercessor for them besides Him, so that they may have Taqwa.
And warn with it those who fear that they shall be gathered to their Lord-- there is no guardian for them, nor any intercessor besides Him-- that they may guard (against evil).
And warn therewith those who fear they shall be mustered to their Lord; they have, apart from God, no protector and no intercessor; haply they will be godfearing.
Warn hereby those who fear (because they know) that they will be gathered unto their Lord, for whom there is no protecting ally nor intercessor beside Him, that they may ward off (evil).
Warn by it those who fear to be gathered before their Lord, when they have no guardian or intercessor besides God, so that they may become God-fearing.
And warn thou therewith those who fear that they shall be gathered unto their Lord, when there shall be for them no patron nor intercessor beside Him; haply they may become God-fearing.
And warn by its means those who fear being mustered toward their Lord, besides whom they shall have neither any guardian nor any intercessor, so that they may be Godwary.

Give this warning to those in whose (hearts) is the fear that they will be brought (to judgment) before their Lord: except for Him they will have no protector nor intercessor: that they may guard (against evil).

And warn therewith (the Quran) those who fear that they will be gathered before their Lord, when there will be neither a protector nor an intercessor for them besides Him, so that they may fear Allah and keep their duty to Him (by abstaining from committing sins and by doing all kinds of good deeds which He has ordained).
And warn with it those who fear to be brought before their Lord that they have no guardian or intercessor, other than Allah, in order that they are cautious.
And warn with it those who fear to be gathered before their Lord—they have no protector or intercessor apart from him—perhaps they will grow in piety.
And warn by the Qur'an those who fear that they will be gathered before their Lord - for them besides Him will be no protector and no intercessor - that they might become righteous.

[6:51] And warn, threaten, therewith, that is, [with] the Qur’ān, those who fear they shall be gathered to their Lord: apart from Him, other than Him, they have no protector, to help them, and no intercessor, to intercede for them (the negative sentence stands as a circumstantial qualifier referring to the subject of [the verb] yuhsharū, ‘they shall be gathered’, and constitutes the object of [what they] fear) — the sinning believers are meant here; so that they might be wary, of God, by desisting from what they engage in and performing deeds of obedience.

(Warn hereby) warn by the Qur'an; it is also said that this means: warn by Allah (those who fear) those who know and have certainty, among them Bilal Ibn Rabah, Suhayb Ibn Sinan, Mihja' Ibn Salih, 'Ammar Ibn Yasir, Salman al-Farisi, 'Amir Ibn Fuhayrah, Khabbab Ibn al-Aratt and Salim, the client of Abu Hudhayfah, (that they will be gathered unto their Lord) after death, (for whom there is no protecting friend) to protect them (nor intercessor beside Him) to interceded for them or save them from the torment, (that they may ward off (evil)) ward off transgressions, and this will help them perform works of obedience.

commentaries.author: ابن عربي
commentaries.text:
{ وأنذر به الذين يخافون } أي: أنذر بما أوحي إليك المستعدّين الذين هم أهل الخوف والرجاء، وأعرض عن الذين قست قلوبهم فإنه لا ينجع فيهم كما قال في أوّل الكتاب:

[البقرة، الآية: 2]
 { أن يُحْشَروا إلى ربّهم ليس لهم من دونه وليّ ولا شفيع } أي: يعلمون بصفاء استعدادهم أنه لا بد من الرجوع إلى الله، فيخافون أن يحشروا إليه في حال كونهم محجوبين عنه بحجب صفاتهم وأفعالهم لا وليّ ينصرهم غير الله فينقذهم من ذلّة البعد وعذاب الحرمان، ولا شفيع يشفع لهم فيقرّبهم منه، ويكرّمهم لفناء الذوات والقدر كلها في الله، وقهره إياهم، كما قال تعالى:

[غافر، الآية: 16]، فيتعظون بسماعهم له ويحدث فيهم الرجاء فيشمرون في السلوك بالجدّ والاجتهاد { لعلهم يتّقون } لكي يحذروا حجب افعالهم وصفاتهم وذواتهم، ويتجرّدوا عنها بالمحو والفناء في الله، ويتجه أن يكون الوليّ القلب، والشفيع الروح، أي: لم يصلوا إلى مقام القلب الذي هو وليّ النفس فينقذها من العذاب وينصرها من الحرمان، ولا إلى مقام الروح فتشفع لهم بإمداد مدد القرب لها واستمدادها من الله وتتوسل بينهم وبين الله

translations.translation:
{And warn with it those who fear} that is, warn with what has been revealed to you those who are prepared, who are the people of fear and hope.,

And turn away from those whose hearts are hardened against the truth - for they will not find any success in this life, as it is written in the first book:
 The cow

البقرة

The cow, The Verse: 2]


{They are to be brought before their Lord, and they will have no one but Him as their advocate or intercessor.} This means that they know their preparation is such that they must turn to Allah alone., They are afraid that they will be brought to him in the case that they are hidden from him by the concealment of their attributes and actions, and that there is no helper for them besides Allah who will save them from the humiliation of separation and the punishment of being forbidden., And there is no intercessor who will intercede for them to bring them closer to Him., He honors them for the perfection and greatness of their character, all of which is in God.,

He overwhelmed them., As Allah has said:

"{وَإِنَّ ٱلْمُسْلِمِينَ وَٱلْمُسْلِمَٰتِ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنَٰتِ وَٱلْقَٰنِتِينَ وَٱلْقَٰنِتَٰتِ وَٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ وَٱلصَّٰدِقَٰتِ وَٱلْصَّٰبِرِينَ وَٱلصَّٰبِرَٰتِ وَٱلْحَٰفِظِينَ فُرُوجَهُمْ وَٱلحَٰفِظَٰتِ وَٱلذَّٰكِرِينَ ٱللَّهَ كَثِيرًا وَٱلذَّٰكِرَٰتِ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ بِٱلْفُرْقَانِ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنَٰتِ وَٱلصَّٰبِرِينَ وَٱلصَّٰبِرَٰتِ وَٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ وَٱلصَّٰدِقَٰتِ وَٱلْقَٰنِتِينَ وَٱلْقَٰنِتَٰتِ وَٱلْعَٰفِينَ وَٱلْعَٰفِٰتِ وَٱلْمُتَّقِينَ وَٱلْمُتَّقَٰتِ وَٱلزَّٰكِينَ وَٱلزَّٰكِيٰتِ وَٱلسَّٰبِحِينَ وَٱلسَّٰبِحَٰتِ وَٱلصَّٰبِرِ


The Forgiver,

The verse: {16},
They are admonished by hearing it and hope arises in them; so they enjoin one another to perseverance and exhort one another to compassion {that they may be God-fearing}. So that they may take heed of their own actions, their own attributes, and their own selves., And they {will} disavow them out of denial and defiance of God.,

And it is incumbent upon the guardian to have a good heart.,

And the intercessor of the soul,

{They} have not reached the station of the heart, which is the guardian of the soul, and thus save it from punishment and liberate it from deprivation., And do not to the station of the soul {al-maqam al-ruhani} so intercede for them with the provision of closeness to her and her reliance on God and intercede between them and God.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { وَأَنذِرْ بِهِ } أي: أنذر بما يوحى إليك يا أكمل الرسل { ٱلَّذِينَ يَخَافُونَ أَن يُحْشَرُوۤاْ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمْ } مع كونهم معتقدون أن { لَيْسَ لَهُمْ مِّن دُونِهِ وَلِيٌّ } يولي أمرهم غيره { وَلاَ شَفِيعٌ } يشفع لهم عنده حتى ينقذهم من عذابه { لَّعَلَّهُمْ يَتَّقُونَ } [الأنعام: 51] لكي يتقوا ويحسنوا العمل لرضاه
